Lucy.action: Provides detailed intelligence about four drug carriers arriving in Europe, including specifics about the drug form and concealment method.

Lucy.action: Uses the police computer to instantly pull up the resumés of the four mules without needing to touch it.

Lucy.action: Confidently confirms to Del Rio that she has the information he needs and ends the call.

Lucy.action: Tells the Flight Attendant 'You should wipe your nose' when she is bleeding.

Lucy.action: Gives a satisfied sigh and closes both laptops after completing her work.

Lucy.action: Lucy calmly emerges from her room in the presence of armed guards and medical staff.

Lucy.action: Calmly emerges from her room despite being confronted by armed officers.

Lucy.action: Halfheartedly raises one hand when ordered to put her hands up.

Lucy.action: Halfheartedly raises one hand and causes two dozen cops to collapse as if switched off.

Lucy.action: Approaches Del Rio closely despite him still holding a gun, maintaining control of the situation.

Lucy.action: Gunning the car through the streets of Paris at high speed, ignoring red lights and yield signs while remaining calm and focused.

Lucy.action: Stands calmly amidst a violent shootout while others are panicking or being shot.
